name: Outlaw Express
description:
Play as Tumbleshot Tom in this wild-west-styled train heist roguelike. Fight enemies by rolling into them, shooting them with your limited bullets, or by using items. Decide whether to use items for their immediate effects or use them to permanently upgrade yourself.

Beware that enemies grow stronger over time due to your increasing bounty with scaling difficulty. Play in a variety of trains, a tutorial, and a boss fight. Can you beat this comedic roguelike?

Play Time: 15-30 minutes

Controls: Space = Roll, E = Interact, WASD/Arrows Keys = Move, Left-Click = Shoot / Click Button, Number Keys = Select Inventory, Mouse Wheel = Scroll Inventory

Credits:

  • Caleb Kahn: Game Designer & Programmer & UI Design
  • Thomas Revord: Lead Artist & Sound Design
  • Mitchell Young: Game Producer
  • Gabriel Slye: Lead Programmer
  • Ray Hazlip: Executive Producer
